content: Won't connect to calibre
replyContent: Hi, we apologize for any issue you might be having! Could you send details of what you are experiencing to our customer support at calibre.sync.help@gmail.com? We'll get you up and running.

content: Thanks for the app. It is much better than competitors as one can load the entire calibre library onto a phone and peruse or read without internet. Great for us travelers... one less thing to worry about
replyContent: Thank you for your encouraging words.

content: Great app and most importantly a good support team. He takes care of suggestions and is very quick in responses and developments. Keep it up!
replyContent:
Hi,
Thanks for your feedback. We are continuously working on adding more features to our app to make your experience better.

content: Suggestion: have CS be able to connect to existing Calibre content server within the LAN instead of manual user input.
replyContent:
Hi,
We've forwarded your feedback to our developers. Thank you for taking out the time to send us your suggestions!

content: Thank you for filling a need that is sorely missing in that your app connects to so many different cloud providers. Upon setting up integration with my existing library in OneDrive, the app successfully downloaded the covers for all 4,372 books without having to retry even once. That's a good indicator to me as my experience with a similar app "Calibre-Go" tends to require multiple attempts. I'm finding a need for more documentation on connecting to a Calibre Content Server. When connecting via IP address it fails. However, I found that if I add the "/opds" suffix to the url, the app returns "Sign in Successful" but it fails to display anything except for a blank white screen and a spinning blue circle. After approx 10 minutes of spinning, I'll close the app and reopen to find the library has not been added. Still deserving of 5 stars for the fact that you're actively maintaining an app where IMHO there is no competition and I must encourage others to find your app and support it hoping it encourages you to continue with your work.
replyContent: Hi Christopher, thank you very much for using our app and your feedback, we've included more information about how to set up Calibre Content server in this website https://calibresync.bitbucket.io. Could you please also contact us on calibre.sync.help@gmail.com, we can help you resolve your problem. Thanks

content: Does everything I need it to and does it well. Developers are really responsive, they fixed an issue where the all would open books in read only mode.
replyContent: We're always working hard to improve the app. Thanks for your download and feedback.

content: I stumbled on a bug with nextcloud integration, and emailed their support line about it. They had a fix rolled out in days. The app itself is great and works perfectly, but their support is also above and beyond.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Does the job really well
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: I wanted to give this app a chance because what I want to do is simple. It did connect well with Dropbox. So that was promising. However the purpose for me was to download my books into a folder of my choosing on my phone. I changed the default download directory. But it still only wrote the files to the original download folder "download". No success after trying a few different things. So this was a fail for me.
replyContent: Hi Jenny, we're sorry that you have the issue, changing the current download directory of a library is set via each library setting rather than the default location. If it is not clear enough, please contact us via calibre.sync.help@gmail.com, we can then help you with this issue. Cheers.

content: 5 stars but the initial screen image and icon is not so stylish as I would like but way better than c-companion...Onedrive sync is not working. Keep on with new features and improving you will have much sucess. Cheers
replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! We will keep working on it! Cheers.

content: Excellent, Use this app with my Dropbox calibre folder, very nice way to view my virtual library when away from home to choose my next read. Especially love the feature of being able to 'zoom' out and in to change how many thumbnails are displayed. The only feature that i believe was lacking in previous versions. Thanks.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your reviews and feedbacks. We will keep improving the app for better user experience. Cheers.

content: It's okay in a pinch when Calibre companion isn't working right. But it can be much better. Calibre companion has customized fields that can actually be seen for quick search. This one I have to hunt and Peck. I'm unsure if putting them in a search tree would be better or worse. Also Calibre companion has small blurbs about what the book actually is before you get into the information window. This has three Windows, and not alot of information, Took me a while to find the actual blurb.
replyContent: Hi Amy, thanks for your feedbacks. We will continue improving the app for better user experience. Cheers.

content: Excellent app, perfect for my Calibre libraries! Highly recommended.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Moved to C-Sync from C-Companion and couldn't be happier! Devs responded to a question of mine AND CHANGED THE APP within 24 hours. It works with most Cloud services (in particular Box which I've just moved to) and has a reasonably intuitive interface. The filter options are amazing, particularly for my collection which is largely fanfic, so many thousands of 'books'. :D Filter by author, tags, publisher, any of the columns in Calibre including your own custom columns, and filter on an any/all basis. C-Sync will bring you works which meet any one of your filters, or flip a toggle and it will bring you works which meet ALL of your filters. Very useful! The search function is also great, giving search results for more than just title and author including series and publisher. Five stars!
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Good interface, live search results, connects fine with OneDrive. Very fast response to queries/problems (mostly caused by Google Play!)
replyContent: Hi, thank you very much for your feedback.

content: Is it not possible to drag the side-scrollbar in order to navigate faster through your library? The way it is now I can only get to the bottom of my library by constantly swiping through it which is time consuming when you have a large library
replyContent: Hi Bonny, the current update of the app now supports draggable scrollbar. Please check it out :)

content: An outstanding program. I had a suggestion and received a response within 24 hours and the suggestion acted upon the following day. Wow.
replyContent: Thanks for your kind feedback. Enjoy using our app :)

content: Exceeded my expectation.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!

content: Not able to connect with Dropbox. Multiple crashes. Unusable.
replyContent: Hi Robert, the latest version of the app has fixed this issue with Dropbox. Please try again if applicable. Cheers.

content: Won't sync files to sdhc.'
replyContent: Hi Thomas, sorry to hear about your issue, in order to use library from sdcard, you might have to copy the library manually to the sdcard. Synchronization only applies to Cloud libraries. Could you please contact us on calibre.sync.help@gmail.com, we might be able to help you resolve the issue. Hope to hear from you soon.

content: Great app! Though was disappointed when I first installed this it don't have the option to connect with Google Drive so I had to move my Calibre library to another cloud service that this app support. Other than that everything works great.
replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app and taking out the time to write us the review. About Google Drive, unfortunately, we have to drop support for it due to Google has changed its policy on Drive readonly scope this year, which makes it very hard to support. We hope that other cloud services still good enough for your needs. Cheers.

content: Amazing app and great dev response, resolving an issue in under a day. Only suggestions: OLED black theme, and adhoc temp book cover download
replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app and taking out the time to write us the review. We will keep working on it!

content: Seems great so far. I only wish that I could also add books to my library from the app.
replyContent: Thank you for using our app and taking out the time to send us your suggestions. We will keep working on it!

content: Great app
replyContent: Thank you very much. Keep using our app :)
